name: CROCODILE

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape

actions.name: DC 12)
actions.text: While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition.

actions.name: Our gods' proscriptions are clear
actions.text: I won't order my warriors to fetch the head of the crocodile Thousand Teeth-no matter how many it devours. You adventurers, on the other hand ... -QUEEN OTHOKENT,

raw_text:
